Summary: 2 bright flashes of blue light occurred within minutes of each other, lighting up the sky.

divs: sighting detailsmy friends and i were driving down i-57 at approx. 6pm near savoy\champaign, il. it was stormy that day and there was a very low ceiling. my friend was driving, i was looking at my phone in the passenger seat, and a 3rd person was in the back seat, when the first flash of light appeared. the entire sky lit up. the color was blue. my friend said it was lightning, but the entire sky lit up. and no thunder could be heard. so we all paid attention and waited for the next flash. about a minute later, the entire sky lit up a brilliant blue color. i've never seen lightning that color, nor could it have been a plane. if it was a plane landing at a local airport, the lights would have flashed more frequently. i continued to watch the sky as we continued to drive north on 57, but i did not see the light again. i then called my sister who is a student in champaign to ask if she noticed any flashes of light. she said she did from inside her apartment, but she assumed it was lightning.
